campaign.story:
Have you ever watched a Friday the 13th film and thought you could have avoided a moronic death? Have you ever played a game of Clue and wanted to solve the mystery in a real-life mansion? Have you ever watched an episode of Scooby Doo and wished that, just once, those meddling kids didn’t get in the bad guy’s way?
Devil’s Bluff is the game that will give you that chance!
An online-only isometric action game for up to 10 people for Windows, Mac, and Linux (and hopefully Tablets and Consoles), our goal is to put you inside a new type of survival horror game where every character you encounter is another player - and one of them is a killer.
An experience filled with cooperation and competition, you'll be asked to use your twitch-based reflexes, powers of deduction, and voice chat to find a way to outwit the killer (with or without the help of others) and make it out alive.
Devil's Bluff tells the tale of a group of friends who decide to rent out the world's most haunted Mansion to compete in a scavenger hunt tied to the lore of the old house itself. It's all going great, until someone decides to ruin the fun by promising to kill everyone at the party.
The only way to make it out alive? Work together to finish the scavenger hunt before Devil finishes you.
And how will it all play out? Minute-to-minute gameplay will involve a few core concepts we'd like to familiarize you with. Here's your cheat sheet:
Playing as the Survivors:
Most of you poor schleps will be stuck playing one of the remaining Survivors. You'll have to hope for a little teamwork and smart thinking, or your night may end with the rest of these saps getting you killed. The game will feature a wide variety of costumes, but each player will have the exact same skills and attributes, keeping the playing field level, simple, and fast-paced.
The Survivor gameplay experience focuses on:

The Scavenger Hunt
Players will be paired in teams of two to compete in the scavenger hunt, where they’ll be asked to track down 10 items, each identified by unique clues. To keep every game fresh, elements of the scavenger hunt will be randomized each play-through:
Item Location: The items themselves will have dozens of potential hiding places, including out in the open, inside hidden compartments, deep inside secret passageways, and lost locations inside the Mansions giant hedge maze.
Item Order: Teams will chase the same items one-by-one, but will be given them in a different order. This not only encourages teams to split up, but also gives added incentive to see other fail, as they may have tracked down clues you’ve yet to uncover, allowing you to loot your way into the lead.
Exploring the Mansion
The Mansion itself is full of secrets, many of which require a teammate to fully exploit. Their triggers and locations will move each game, keeping the sense of exploration alive with each new game. Once they have been found, these secrets will become highlighted in the game world and your in-game map, allowing easy access for players who take the time to fully explore the world.
 Here are some examples:
Secret Passageways: Like a mini Pac-man maze, the Mansion is packed with a network of hidden tunnels that serve as shortcuts to other areas, but the switches used to open doors will always be far enough away that a fellow player will have to let you in. This means players who are being chased will have to act quickly to help each other avoid an untimely demise, and players who aren’t exactly thrilled with their teammates will have opportunities to ditch their buddies.
Peep Holes: Passageways will also be peppered with peep holes, which can be used to spy on other players. If you can see other players, you’ll also be able to hear them, which means you might catch Devil in the act, see your partner conspiring with another group, or hear key info from other teams about who they think is the killer.
Trap Doors: Since the switches to these doors are randomized, we thought it would be fun to have them serve a duel purpose: opening trap doors that separate players!These might accidently split you up from a teammate, or be used to get rid of unwanted hangers-on. You can even use them to ditch Devil!
Sliding Staircases: Another element triggered by switches will be sliding staircases, which will case players to fall to the bottom and end up stunned. This will allow players who time it right to slow down Devil and opposing teams at critical moments.
Deathtraps: Another critical element of the Mansion are “deathtraps.” Things like broken railways on balconies and staircases, trap doors that lead to pits of spikes, switches that cause poison arrows to shoot out of holes in the wall…you know, the sort of stuff you can use to send Devil (or other Survivors) to an early grave. They will require perfect positioning and solid timing, but will come in very handy if you can pull it off.
Hiding Places: But maybe you’re a love, not a fighter. Or a coward. Whatever. The Mansion will have plenty of dark corners, hidden cubby holes, and more to allow you to give Devil the slip. Provided he’s not already there waiting, of course.
Real Talk with Real People
Unlike most games that feature audio chat, Devil’s Bluff features proximity-based audio, which means the closer you are to another player the louder they become. 
You can use this to your advantage in situations like:
Listen closely to hear others moving about in the Mansion.
Talk with your partner to share intel.
Eavesdrop and listen in on other team’s conversations.
Tip off other players when you’ve seen the killer in action.
Slapstick Combat
Only Devil can deal melee damage, but you'll be able to whap your fellow survivors for fun or strategic purposes.
Here's some more details:
Players can be slapped in any direction, and will bounce off solid surfaces, giving you the ability to “pinball” them around.
This can be used to knock player’s out of harm’s way, but can also be used to thrust your competition into trouble.
Once they’ve been slapped, they’ll be briefly stunned. This will disable their audio and movement capabilities for a brief period, letting you get a word in edgewise (or allowing Devil to move in for the kill).
Run For Your Lives!
Devil’s Bluff will feature a Mario Bros.­-esque walk/run system with a unique sprinting mechanic. Unlike most games that allow you to sprint for a limited period of time, you’ll be able to sprint as long as you like, with one condition: The longer you hold down the run button, the more likely you are to trip in classic horror movie chase scene fashion. This will add a risk-reward element to movement while being pursued, for both the Survivors and Devil, so plan your escape route carefully!
Capture Devil For the Win
Provided everyone can work together, it is possible to capture Devil once enough info has been gathered on his or her identity. Here’s the basics of how it will work:
Any player who has seen Devil’s true identity can attempt to initiate a capture in a button-mashing mini-game similar to an old-school NES Track ‘N Field tug of war.
Devil is stronger than the survivors, so they’ll have to gang up on him to pull it off.
If you collectively strong-arm Devil into submission and you’re guess is right, you all live to see another day!
However, if players decide not to help, or they get over-powered by Devil, they will take significant damage, which could easily lead to a massive shift in the fight for survival.
Playing as Devil
Each game session, one lucky player gets to play as our mild-mannered maniac, Devil, where they'll get to see how good their killer instincts really are.
Devil has been planning this murderous romp for some time, leading to some key gameplay advantages vs. the standard Survivor toolkit: 
Hidden Identity: Devil will start the game in costume just like the other Survivors, but he or she will be able to rapidly switch between that costume and the alternate Devil outfit, allowing for surprise kills, subterfuge, and more.
The Evil Eye: Devil has extensive knowledge of all the traps and tricks the Mansion has to offer. Just like players who have discovered a hidden element, Devil will be able to automatically see every unseen aspect of the Mansion without having to discover it first.
Skeleton Key: Devil works alone, so in addition to The Evil Eye, they will also have access to a skeleton key, which will allow him or her to open hidden passageways without the aid of others.
The Pitchfork: Last but not least, Devil wields the best (and only) weapon in the Mansion, the mighty-mighty pitchfork. It takes a while to lower the boom, so you’ll have to plan your strikes carefully, but when you land them, look out!
After promising to send him an impossibly adorable Puggle picture at least once a day, we finally convinced Jake “Virt” Kaufman to help us score an eerily orchestral soundtrack that blends classic chiptune chirps with a Sega CD level of audio juiciness.
The soundtrack will be available via Bandcamp as a name your price purchase once we ship, and if you select the right tier, you’ll be able to get your mitts on the music before anyone else.
Pump up your woefully insufficient laptop speakers and jam out to his first taste of audio awesomesauce here:
After slaving away for “The Man” on aggressively mediocre licensed games and an endless line of soul-sucking sequels, we finally decided to fight the good fight and bring some original IP to the world. With veteran developers who’ve shipped games for the likes of EA, Ubisoft, Sega, 2K, and more, the team is ready to put everything we have into Devil’s Bluff. We’re making this as much for you folks as we are for us, and we’re excited to have you along for the journey.  If you still have burning gameplay questions after reading the above, KBJGames headman, Keyur has volunteered to address them himself.  Call him directly at 513.402.0912
Well, after essentially calling out the above publishers as “The Man,” we’re pretty sure they’re not going to start throwing bags of money at us (well, unless they think it would reeeaally hurt). Kidding. But seriously, as we stated above, this is a very personal project for us, and we’re committed to seeing this vision through with as much ownership and investment from the team and our backers as we can manage, and Kickstarter provides us with the perfect platform to do just that.
Speaking of our incredible good-looking, intelligent backer base, we don’t just want you guys to throw money at us an go into a cocoon of anticipatory angst.
From character design to determining the development order of our game modes, we want you to be as involved as possible in the design process, and we've got big plans to make that happen.
For more info on how we plan to ride your brilliant minds to gameplay glory, be sure to check out our Rewards and Stretch Goals section.
First and foremost, we want every Backer of Devil’s Bluff to know how important they are to the team, so we’ll be giving everyone who throws down on the project the opportunity to keep tabs on development, chat with the team and vote on dozens of design decisions via our private backer forums. Members only, people!
Secure yourself a DRM-free digital copy of Devil’s Bluff for PC (or other platforms, as we get Stretchy with it - See Goals that Stretch section for more info). Backers who drop $15 or more can select their platform of choice from these or stretch goal platforms as they become available.
If there’s one thing the Devil enjoys more than offing his fellow party-goers, it’s killing trees. Get your very own old-school print manual, packed with character info, Mansion details and one of those seizure warnings in that impossibly tiny print. *(Also available in Digital format)
Overwhelm your ears with the OST from Jake Kaufman. Packed with more sweet sound than you can shake a pitchfork at in one shiny jewel case, complete with exclusive cover art and liner notes galore.
A must for getting in the right frame of mind to play Devil’s Bluff, this peerless fashion accessory reminds you to ask yourself “What Would Devil Do?” Drive slow in the fast lane Refuse to help old ladies cross the street! Stand in front a packed elevator while people try to exit! Whatever you do, make it a Devil day!
Worship at the alter of evil via lovingly crafted of the master of mayhem himself, Devil. Perfect for desktop deviants and bookshelf bad guys, this one-of-a-kind villain is a must for all dedicated disciples of the everyone’s favorite evil-doer.
Your very own high-quality Devil’s Bluff bumper sticker, which you can slap on your locker, laptop, car or the foreheads of your enemies. Go nuts, people!
Display your devotion to Devil’s Bluff on your wall with this limited edition 18x24 custom foil print that’s sure to inspire all sorts of unspeakable acts of deception during your moments in the Mansion.
Remember before the days of in-game maps, when titles came with sweet pack-in maps you could hang on your wall? So do we, and we’re bringing the geographic goodness with this highly-stylized, full color 24x18 poster. *(Also available in Digital format)
Want a leg up on the competition? This softbound saddle-stitched guide will get you thinking like an evil genius, offering up:
Detailed maps of the Manson that note all potential interaction points.
Info on every last trap, tricky and gimmick you'll encounter and how to make the most of them.
In-Depth strategies on how to play the role of Devil, the friendly survivor, and the out-for-self a-hole.
Suggestions on how to make use of each character based on their physical appearance.
A guide to real-time conversations that will detail how to work a room and get people on your side.
And more!
It will also include a complete collection of all the scribbles and sketches that helped shape the characters, animations and world of Devil’s Bluff.
And for all your LARPers out there, the guide will also make hosting your very own Devil’s Bluff scavenger hunt a lot easier thanks to a pain-staking recreated Scavenger Hunt Guidebook, including the rules and regulations for the game, checklists and official scorecards! Just try to keep the real-life killings to a minimum, folks.
Remember when games came in tragically fragile boxes? Still like the extra oomph of modern-day special editions? Get both! The Physical DE includes:
A digital copy of the game
Game Box (physical)
The Game Manual (print)
The Deluxe Strategy Guide (print)
The Manor Map Poster (print)
Limited Edition Poster (print)
The Devil's Bluff Soundtrack (physical)
A Devil's Bluff Bumper Sticker
A WWDD Bracelet
Vinyl Devil Mini
Plus you'll get a digital edition of each you can pass along to your cheapskates buddies who didn’t dish out that Deluxe edition dough.
Wear your black, shameless heart on your sleeve with this Backer-exclusive unisex 4.2oz 100% cotton Short-Sleeve Tee.
Upgrade your wardrobe worthiness with this high-quality designer custom-designed hoodie featuring custom art from lead artist Art Vogt.
Move over, Slenderman! With this replica of the Devil’s in-game mask, you’ll be able to terrify your friends in new and interesting ways! Bougie turtle-neck optional.
Immortalize your image via lead artist Art Vogt in the form of a one-of-a-kind concept piece that captures your charm via an exclusive piece of Devil’s Bluff concept art. It may even end up in the final game!
Want to be among the first to play Devil’s Bluff? Back one of our Tester Tiers and dive in early, helping us crush bugs, refine mechanics, and perfect the art of being a back-stabbing, poker-faced Bluffer from the jump. Backers of the Killer Edition tier will also get a heavily increased chance of playing Devil during testing. Plus everyone will get credit in the game as an official QA Team Member.
Want to get a little taste of the rock n’ roll rollercoaster that is game development? Back a Design Tier and work directly with the team, attending meetings via Skype or Google Hangout and help with new costume ideas, take new rooms from concept to completion, and add interesting new traps and tricks to the Mansion. You’ll even get credit in the game as a Design Specialist!
Members of our design tiers also get an added bonus in the forum of a digital copy of the final Game Design Document (or GDD, as it’s called in the biz). Learn how ideas go from concept to completion with this detailed blueprint of the game you helped create!
We hope you’re really into this game, but let’s say you actually want to get in to Devil’s Bluff? We’ve got your back, people! Get your face in the game in one of the Mansion’s numerous wacky family portraits and help us class this joint up a little.
We’d be lying if we didn’t confess that we lazily sip bourbon by firelight on a near-nightly basis, but if we hit our Kickstarter goal, we’re kicking this bad boy off by throwing down, KBJ style! If you’re a Backer on any of our high-end tiers and can get to Cincinnati, OH, you’re officially invited to come help us put a dent in our bar tab as we ramble on about the game and how awesome you all are for helping us make it a reality.
Finally, in the event that any of our independently wealthy potential Backers decide to drop the big bucks on the Bluff, we’re pulling out all the stops. We’ll fly you out for a 3-day visit to meet the team on Halloween of next year, show you all the behind-the-scenes stuff we hide on our dev chats with clever camera angles, play a livestreamed match for bragging rights for the whole community to watch, hit up a haunted house, and last but not least, cruise the mean streets of Cincinnati for some life-altering shenanigans. All you have to do is sign a waiver ensuring our lawyers you won’t sue us in the event you, like, lose a limb or something. Pretty standard stuff, really.
The Deal with PS4, PS Vita, Xbox One & Wii U
Time will tell which platforms you Bluffers help bring to life, but everyone who purchase a copy of the game (yes, even you, Champion of Early-Birdness!) get to choose the platform of their choice once the campaign has ended.
New Game Modes: Even More Ways to Be a Weasel
There's a handful of game modes we've decided are locked into certain Goals (such as Double Trouble Mode, where two Devils can co-operate to eliminate the survivors or compete against each other to determine who oozes more evil), but the rest?
You guys will determine which modes make the cut by popular vote, choosing between options like:
Sole Survivor Mode - In this timed mode, all players play the role of Devil but one. Luckily, they have a Mansion Map and a Skeleton Key that instantly opens up all secret passageways. How long can you survive?
Every Devil for Themselves - Everyone is a bad guy in this free-for-all  Devil deathmatch mode. We fully anticipate some WWE-style battle royal madness here. Temporary teamwork, weaker Devils running away from fights, and mounting tension as the player pool dwindles will undoubtedly be in the cards. The jury's still out on a folding chair to the face, but we'll try our best.
Mimic Mode - In this sneaky slice of Bluff, Devil will be able to steal the costume from each survivor he or she kills, adding to their arsenal of deception with each death. Easily the amateur voice actor's favorite.
And many more! We'll even bring the best community suggestions into the mix.
Get Gussied Up with Costume Party Packs
If you crashed as many Halloween parties as we did this year, we're pretty sure you saw some sweet get-ups. We did, and we were left with tons of ideas for new Survivor costumes for the final retail version of the game.
As such, as we hope to use a portion of certain Stretch Goals to add several 4-Costume Party Packs featuring new threads that you will get to vote into the game via 2-step process.
First up, you'll choose the costume type. Want to see a clown and a lion tamer? Vote them in! Think clowns are evil, terrifying blights on a restful sleep? Vote in a pirate and ninja instead!
Finally, we'll provide a series of sketches for each costume, and Backers will vote on their favorite version of the costume y'all have chosen and WHAMMY! It's in the game. Take that, EA Sports. Kidding. Please don't sue us.
The more Bluffers we can amass in the Kickstarter Mansion, the better this game will be, so we'd really appreciate you spreading the word.
But before you head out the door and start harassing random people on the street on our behalf, here's a few ways you can promote the project without abandoning the confines of your oh-so-comfy couches:
Like Us On Facebook
Follow Us on Twitter 
Visit Our Website
Of course, when that's done, you're more than welcome to go solicit strangers wearing that once-worn Halloween costume you just stashed away in the closet. Just don't expect us to pay your bail if things get weird. Printing up t-shirts that say "Free [Kickstarter Backer Name Here]" is pretty much our limit.
Lastly, we are a proud member of the Kicking It Forward community: http://kickingitforward.org
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
By now, you’ve read enough of these “Risks and Challenges” thingies to get that making games is tough. Bringing a concept like Devil’s Bluff to life will be no different, as we’re looking to blend old-school gameplay values with never-before-seen mechanics that rely on both competition and cooperation, and finding that balance will be tricky. Luckily, we have a team with over 20 shipped titles under there belts across 11 platforms and our biggest secret weapon: all of you. We’ve spent tons of time refining the core concepts of the game, and plan to work tirelessly to test, tune and perfect the art of backstabbing with our Backers until we’ll find the right balance of strategy, technique and fun that will make Devil’s Bluff a unique, memorable experience unlike any other.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
As gamers go, I’m a bit of an old fart. I’ve been playing and designing online multiplayer experiences since consoles first connected to the Internet. And as a small town kid who up and moved to California to pursue my dream as a game designer, hopping online and duking it out with other gamers was as close as I could get to the couch co-op experiences offered up by the 2600 and the NES. Back then, it seemed like every new game brought something different to the table.
Then everything changed.

Hey there, fellow Devils!
We're packing up for an amazingly spontaneous trip to Vegas to nerd out at The PlayStation Experience this weekend, but we couldn't leave without giving you folks some new and juicy tidbits of Bluffy goodness.
Slap 'Em Silly!

Hey Gang,
We’re now knee-deep in Week 2, and we’d like to take this time to welcome everyone who’s joined us here in the Mansion since our last update.
So what’s new?
Media Madness

Hey, Folks!
We're a week into the Kickstarter Shuffle, and we wanted to take time out to thank each and every one of you who've signed up to help us get our dream off the ground! This project wouldn't be possible without all of you, and we can't say enough about what it means to have you along for the ride.
Picking up the Pace!

campaign.story:
Love Your Face is a fresh and natural skincare line developed for women who want a powerful skin-rejuvenating solution without powerful (and harmful) chemicals.
What makes Love Your Face unique?
Love Your Face is...
#1 100% NATURAL:
Love Your Face products are made from all-natural ingredients and completely free from commonly used chemicals like parabens, mineral oil, phthalates, sodium lauryl sulfate, triclosan, and synthetic fragrances.

You shouldn't have to choose between being beautiful or healthy. With Love Your Face, you can be both.
#2 OUR SPECIAL INGREDIENT – AN ANCIENT HEALING HERB: 
While researching ingredients for our formula, we discovered a forgotten, ancient herb call Plantain (not the banana-like plant, though!), so powerful, Native Americans referred to it as “life medicine.”
Used by cultures around the world for centuries, this herb not only works as an anti-inflammatory, it's an all-natural analgesic and antioxidant that has also been found to enhance the effectiveness of SPF in sunscreens.
Love Your Face is the very FIRST skincare line that uses this herb in an entire line of natural products. Scroll down to the "Our Special Ingredient" section to learn more about this amazing plant.
#3 MINIMALIST:
Less is more. You don't need bottles of half-used, chemical-based skincare products piling up in your bathroom cabinet – you need something that you'll use and something that works.

Love Your Face puts an end to counter clutter with a simple five-product line of essential skincare products. Plus, the bold, and beautiful containers are so sleek, you won't want to hide them.
#4 FEARLESS:
Love Your Face is a social enterprise with a mission that goes beyond simply creating high-quality, all-natural skincare. Every year, we'll give a percentage of our profits back to the community through our FEARLESS FUND to help other women who want to change their lives and the lives of others through entrepreneurial and community-based projects. 
#5 ENVIRONMENTALLY CONSCIOUS:
100% of the ingredients we source are natural, so we think it's extremely important to take care of the planet we all live on. All of our packaging – from our glass bottles to our packing material – is eco-friendly, reusable, or fully recyclable.
By becoming a backer of this project, you will help us launch this movement, and in exchange, you will receive Love Your Face products (and some great bonuses) at a highly discounted price.
Sample-Size Kits vs. Full-Size Kits
Sample-size kits contain our cleanser, scrub, mask and lotion in 1oz glass jars. Full-size kits contain 4oz glass jars of our mask, scrub, and lotion and 8oz glass bottles of our cleanser and spray.
Fearless Weekend
If there's a gap between where you are in life right now and where you want to be, the Fearless Weekend is for you. You'll join dozens of other fearless women for a powerful weekend of fun and growth in the heart of trendy Nashville, TN.

For two days, from August 29 - 30, 2015, we'll help you find the clarity, confidence and courage to lead the life you've always wanted to live. You'll discover how to boldly unleash your gifts onto the world while you make life-long friendships with other passionate women.

(Sorry guys, this is for women only!)
Spa & Adventure Day
The day after the Fearless Weekend is YOUR day. We're taking up to six women for a full day of adventure and rejuvenation.

We'll start the day with breakfast at one of Nashville's most popular restaurants. Afterward, we'll take you just outside Nashville for a team building, zip line tour through the beautiful landscape of Tennessee. You'll be served a gourmet, all vegetarian lunch and, in the afternoon, we'll head to the spa for two relaxing treatments. For dinner, we'll take you to another Nashville hot-spot for incredible food and great company.

It'll be a day you'll never forget, not only because of the experiences you'll have, but because of the life-long friendships that will be created. (Note: This event will take place the day after the Fearless Weekend.)
1-on-1 Business Coaching
Do you run your own business or have an idea for a new business? Through 1-on-1 business coaching, Laurel can help you ignite your business.

You'll learn how to bring in more clients, make more money, and have more free time, all with more ease, so you'll effortlessly be able to share your passion and talent with the world. The coaching package above includes three one-hour private phone sessions with Laurel. (Visit laurelstaples.com for more information.)
Design Our Next Product
This is your opportunity to be part of skincare history!
What's the next Love Your Face product going to be? What essential oils should we use? What name should we give it? It's up to you! 
In the Design-Our-Next-Product package, you will work directly with us to design our next limited edition product. Plus, you'll be given full credit on the website and the product label.
HOLIDAY GIFT CARDS
Want to give Love Your Face as a gift to your friends and family this holiday season? We can help!

Request one of our fun Holiday “IOU” Cards to give as a gift this season. We'll mail them out to you between December 15-December 22. Your friend or family member will get her rewards shipped directly in March 2015.
We don't think it's necessary to clutter your bathroom cabinets with dozens of products...most of which you don't even use.
“Less is more” when it comes to skincare. You only need a few, high-quality products to uncover your most radiant and flawless skin.
The Love Your Face skincare line consists of just five simple (and essential) facial skincare products:
[MAKE TODAY COUNT] CLEANSER - 8oz (Aloe + Plantain)
[KEEP TAKING CHANCES] SCRUB - 4oz (Aloe + Plantain)
[BREAK THE RULES] MASK - 4oz (Aloe + Plantain)
[MAKE IT HAPPEN] LOTION - 4oz (Aloe + Hyaluronic Acid)
[FIND YOUR VOICE] SPRAY - 8oz (Aloe + Rose)
THE FULL COLLECTION: Includes the entire 5-piece collection listed above plus a reusable cotton pouch. Everything is beautifully packaged in a kraft gift box.
THE ESSENTIAL COLLECTION: Includes the full-size cleanser, scrub and lotion plus a reusable cotton pouch. 
SAMPLE SIZE KIT: Includes the cleanser, scrub, mask and lotion, each in 1oz glass jars packaged in a small kraft gift box.
All our products are 100% natural and completely free of harmful parabens, mineral oil, phthalates, sodium lauryl sulfate, triclosan, and synthetic fragrances.
WHAT'S IN A NAME?
Each of the Love Your Face products is named with a piece of advice we'd give our younger selves. Everyday, they're a daily reminder of what it takes to live life fearlessly.
Through extensive research and help from horticulturist Ashlyn Morgan, we discovered an ancient herb that's been used for thousands of years to sooth and heal skin.
Yet, this amazing plant has been all but lost to our culture over the last several decades...until now.
This ancient healing herb is Plantago Major. It's more commonly known as “Plantain” (although it's different than the banana-like plant with the same name).
When we traced this plant back through history, what we found was incredible...
Love Your Face is the VERY FIRST skincare company to use plantain for its entire line of products. And we will source our plantain locally from female farmer & horticulturalist, Ashlyn Morgan, who will grow it exclusively for us in a special, apothecary garden on her 50-acre organic farm in East Tennessee (starting in Spring 2015).
Plantain is great for your skin because it is...
Our broader mission at Love Your Face is to create a company that helps and empowers other women. Creating a skincare line that allows you feel beautiful and confident about the way you look is one way we do that. Another way is through the FEARLESS FUND.
The FEARLESS FUND provides scholarships and training for women who want to open businesses or start community projects that positively affect the community. Once a year, we'll run a contest and award financial support to women who have great ideas and want to turn those ideas into reality. (Note: Kickstarter funds will not go towards FF scholarships.)
We believe that women who follow their dreams are unstoppable. And we want to be a part of the ripple effect of positive change that spreads throughout the world when we start taking action to create better lives for ourselves and others.
We've made small, test market batches of Love Your Face products, but the funds raised via Kickstarter will help us to fully develop and package Love Your Face, so it's ready for release to the public.
The moment this campaign ends, we'll ship Holiday Gift Cards so backers will have them in time to give as gifts to friends and family. We'll finalize our formulation and order the materials needed to start bulk production—ingredients, bottles, packaging, and labels. Manufacturing will start in January 2015 and we'll start taking orders at LYFace.com. Rewards to all backers will be shipped by March 2015.
Business website setup (shopping cart, plugins, etc.) – 3%
Business entity set up (trademarks, insurance, etc.) – 8%
Sourcing organic plantain from TN – 15%
Purchasing eco-friendly containers and packaging – 36%
Producing the product line in bulk batches – 14%
Purchasing essential business supplies (label printer, work tables, etc.) – 11%
Extras (shipping, t-shirts, marketing, etc.) – 13%
Shipping anywhere inside the USA is free. International backers will be responsible for shipping fees and any applicable tariffs and/or customs fees.
Five years ago, I got home from work one evening, walked straight into my bathroom and dumped all of my makeup and skincare into the trashcan. I was done with being a victim of the beauty industry.
Earlier that day, I'd discovered that every single one of my regular beauty products—the lotions, cleansers, shampoos, lip balms, and makeup brands I'd used and trusted for more than a decade— contained carcinogens.
How could a company release something known to cause cancer?
I researched the topic further and learned the majority of skincare products on the market contain this type of thing – harsh chemicals and synthetics like parabens, phthalates, tricoloson, sodium laureth sulfate and more. They are skin irritants, endocrine disruptors, and carcinogens.
CHECK OUT WHAT I DISCOVERED...
BreastCancerFund.org: “In the U.S., major loopholes in federal law allow the cosmetics industry to put thousands of synthetic chemicals into personal care products, even if those chemicals are linked to cancer, infertility or birth defects.” 
NaturalNews.com: “Common, brand-name skin care products often contain multiple chemical contaminants known to cause cancer, liver disorders and neurological disorders.” – 
HuffingtonPost.com: “Parabens possess estrogen-mimicking properties that are associated with increased risk of breast cancer. These chemicals are absorbed through the skin and have been identified in biopsy samples from breast tumors. They can be found in makeup, body washes, deodorants, shampoos and facial cleansers.” – 
Environmental Working Group: "One of every five adults is potentially exposed every day to all of the top seven carcinogenic impurities common to personal care product ingredients."  
Livestrong.com: “Methylparaben is used as a fragrance and as a preservative ingredient in skin care products, according to the Skin Deep Cosmetic Database. It is toxic to non-reproductive organs in the human body and may cause cancer, skin irritation, neurotoxicity and may disrupt endocrine function.”  
Being Beautiful Shouldn't Kill You
The majority of skincare products on the market should come with an overt Surgeon General's warning on the front like cigarettes.
But they don't. And they probably never will.
So it's up to each of us to learn the risks involved with using these products and find a better solution for ourselves.
Love Your Face is that solution.
After throwing away my entire beauty regimen, I made it my mission to find products that would work in harmony with my body and not against it. You shouldn't have to risk your health to look and feel beautiful.
When Laurel Met Kate
When I met Kate years later, I discovered that as an aesthetician, she'd been on the same quest to find natural products for herself and her clients. We immediately bonded over our shared passion.
While Kate and I were having coffee one day, the idea for Love Your Face was born. Instead of continuing to search high and low for natural products that met our high standards, we decided to create our own.
So that's exactly what we did. But it didn't stop at a skincare line...
From the moment we came up with the idea for Love Your Face, we wanted our mission to be more than just healthy beauty products. We wanted to start a movement of fearlessness.
Our goal is to help you push fear aside, feel fully confident about yourself, and follow your dreams. That's why we named the company “Love Your Face”, designed packaging with bold & inspiring statements, and launched the FEARLESS FUND. Every bit of Love Your Face has been designed with the fearless woman in mind.
LAUREL STAPLES – COFOUNDER + VISIONARY + CHOCOHOLIC
Laurel Staples is an engineer-turned-entrepreneur. Seven years ago, she quit her corporate mechanical engineering job to launch and develop a series of retail clothing stores specializing in eco-friendly fashion. Today, she is a respected business coach and advisor who specializes in helping business owners across the country increase both freedom and flexibility in their lives without sacrificing profits. Learn more at her website LaurelStaples.com.
MOTTO: Either we will find a way or we will make one.
FUN FACT: My college roommate had to show me how to (properly) apply makeup. 
COULDN'T LIVE WITHOUT: Dark chocolate.
FAVORITE PAST-TIME: Hiking the beautiful trails of Tennessee.
KATE MASON – COFOUNDER + CONNECTOR + ETERNAL OPTIMIST
Kate Mason is a licensed aesthetician and life coach. She’s spent the last three years helping women to feel more beautiful and more empowered so they can take on the world. As an aesthetician, she’s an expert in natural beauty products and high-quality skincare. In her life-coaching business, she focuses on helping her clients rediscover their inner confidence to achieve specific goals and gain an overall sense of fulfillment.
MOTTO: Strength and confidence in yourself can get you through just about anything.
FUN FACT: I secretly believe breakfast tacos can save the world. I also really enjoy metal music. Like, a lot.
COULDN’T LIVE WITHOUT: Brunch, my friends and family and the color black.

※日本語版ページはこちらをご覧ください。(Japanese version) 
     ＊中文版請點閱這裡 (Chinese version) 
Smart Air Conditioner Control
Ambi automatically adjusts your AC thanks to intelligent prediction algorithms.
Ambi Climate is a small, sleek internet of things device that makes your existing infrared remote-controlled air conditioner smart.
It allows you to sync your AC with your smartphone, giving you complete access to monitor and control your air conditioner wherever you are.
Ambi Climate uses predictive climate control by monitoring the temperature and environment both inside and outside maximizing energy use. In fact, thermal comfort isn't about temperature alone. That is why Ambi Climate takes into a consideration sunlight, temperature, humidity and other elements to maintain a more comfortable, energy efficient interior environment.
The device also learns from your own preferences and daily routine, and will tailor your indoor climate around you and your family. 
By making your aircon usage more efficient, Ambi Climate can easily cut your energy bill by a third.
Key Features
What People Are Saying
“With the room temperature staying more consistent, you're saving both energy and the hassle of finding the remote.” - Richard Lai, Engadget
“It's a popular campaign - with 35 days to go, the project is at about 240 percent of its funding goal.” - Steven Sande, TUAW
“Ambi Climate might be well-positioned to pick up the parts of the market not covered by Nest” - Darrell Etherington, TechCrunch
“This tiny iPhone-connected device can help you save money on air conditioning” - Chris Smith, BGR
“[Ambi Climate] will make any window air conditioner an iPhone-connected device with temperature and other predictive climate control features.” - Jordan Kahn, 9to5Mac
"エアコンをスマートにコントロールする「Ambi Climate」” - Gizmodo Japan
 ご家庭のエアコンに手軽な賢さを。「Ambi Climate」でスマートなエアコンライフを実現！- 編集部, Spotry.me
               How Ambi Climate Works
    Ambi Mode: Intelligent & Automatic Climate Control
Ambi Climate allows for automatic control of your air conditioner through its intelligent algorithms with "Ambi Mode". Throughout the day, the Ambi Cloud continuously analyses your home’s climate characteristics, your air conditioner’s performance and local weather conditions in order to come up with the best settings for your own personal comfort.
Ambi Mode: Ambi Climate Continues To Adjust Your AC Automatically
While your air conditioner does its temperature sensing from within the unit, Ambi Climate uses its own set of sensors to collect data closer to where you are in the room, providing a more relevant reading than your AC.
With Ambi Climate's companion app on iOS and Android, you will also be able to take full control of your home's air conditioners wherever you are.
Tailored Around Your Temperature Preferences
We know that every person has their own varying thermal comfort preferences. Some of us will always prefer it cooler than others. Using our smartphone companion app you can have Ambi Climate adjust your indoor temperature to either a cooler or warmer setting. 
Simply choose in the companion app whether you are too hot or too cold.
Given the temperature choice you have made, our Ambi Cloud system saves a snapshot of your current indoor and outdoor climate conditions. This allows Ambi Climate to better understand what feels comfortable to you under the saved conditions. Ambi Climate will learn from these snapshots so that its prediction algorithms become tailored around your own thermal comfort preferences.
Ambi Climate is also able to balance the individual temperature preferences of your family.
               Remote Access To Your AC Wherever You Are
Ambi Climate allows you to remotely monitor and control your home’s air conditioning.
With Ambi Climate app's "Manual mode", you can manually switch on/off your AC and adjust other air conditioning settings such as fan speed, temperature and humidity levels. 
Away Mode: Maintain Humidity / Temperature Levels
If you are away for longer durations, you can always set Ambi Climate to “Away mode”. Away Mode allows you to maintain certain temperature and humidity levels at home, so that your pet can remain comfortable or you prevent mould growth when you are away on vacation.
Set to "Away Mode" to maintain desired humidity and temperature levels when not at home.
Reduces Wasteful Overcooling & Temperature Fluctuations
The ability of air conditioners to maintain a certain temperature can fluctuate depending on their age and conditions. Our own tests have shown that at times your actual room temperature can be as much as 11˚F (6˚C) off from the desired temperature you have set on your AC’s remote.
Set & forget. Ambi Climate allows you to maintain a constant climate.
This often hurts both your comfort and energy consumption as your air conditioner can easily end up overcooling your home due to these inaccuracies.
With Ambi Climate, you no longer need to think about whether 76˚F or 77˚F (or alternatively 24˚C or 25˚C) is comfortable to you. Just set it to automatic climate control via Ambi mode, which will make sure that you always enjoy a comfortable indoor climate.
Location Aware: Turns Your AC Automatically On/Off
Geo & Micro Location: Ambi Climate can switch on/off your AC based on your location.
Ambi Climate's app tracks your geo-location and micro-location allowing us to automatically turn on your AC before you get home, and turn off your AC when nobody is present in a particular room. Ambi Climate's location awareness allows you to arrive at a cool home and at the same time you get to avoid cooling empty rooms.
Data Insights
Data Insights: Monitor your AC usage and energy consumption.
The Ambi Climate iPhone and Android app also gives you insight into how certain conditions feel in your home via Humidex, a measure that has been shown to correlate strongly with indoor human comfort. Through this measure, you will start to get a feel for how certain thermal conditions correspond to different levels of energy consumption -- which you can also better understand via our proprietary energy consumption estimator.
               Ambi Climate Air Conditioner Compatibility
    Ambi Climate works with all sort of air conditioners from all over the world, including AC models popular in Hong Kong, Singapore, Malaysia, Australia, Taiwan, Japan and of course North America. Our smart home device supports wall-mounted split and mini split air conditioners as well as window and portable standing air conditioners. Even ACs used in offices such as cassette air conditioners are compatible with Ambi Climate. All they require is infrared connectivity.
* Can't find your remote? Don't worry, we are adding new remotes nearly every day. Just fill out this request form and we can add yours to the database within a couple of days.
Installation & Setup
Ambi Climate is easy to install, requiring no additional expertise or tools. Just plug it in, and position the Ambi Climate device practically anywhere in the same room as your aircon. With 5 powerful infrared transmitters, the signal is almost guaranteed to reach your air conditioner from anywhere within the room. Place Ambi Climate close to you to make sure it’s measuring the same conditions that you experience - on your bedside table, or on the shelf behind your sofa.
Place Ambi Climate anywhere you want.
Setup is also a breeze - all you need to do is to download the free iOS or Android companion app from the Apple App Store or Google Play, and you’ll be up and running within minutes. Just enter your WiFi network details and pair the Ambi Climate device to your AC. Our proprietary algorithm matches your AC to the remote codes in our database, so that you don’t have to “teach” Ambi Climate your codes.
    API & Integrations
Looking at building a connected home? Home automation enthusiast? Ambi Climate will offer up an open API and IFTTT (If This Then That) integration.
This will open up your Ambi Climate and your AC to a new world of possibilities. Thanks to an open API, you will be able to integrate your Ambi Climate with a range of smart home hubs such as SmartThings, Revolv and Quirky's Wink.
By using IFTTT, your Ambi Climate will also be able to connect to all kinds of gadgets and services that can act as triggers for Ambi Climate such as SMS, Twitter, Facebook, Google Drive, Android Wear, Android/iPhone notifications as well as smart home appliances and wearables such as the Philips Hue, Jawbone Up, Fitbit, Belkin Wemo Switch, Nest, the Netatmo Weather Station and many more.
The possibilities will be endless. Eventually your air conditioner will be able to connect with just about anything in your house or apartment.
What is the Limited Edition of Beta Units?
Backing the Limited Edition is your chance to become part of our journey and play an active role in our product development. We believe Kickstarter is a great community, filled with eager early adopters who share our vision of the home of the future.
Limited Edition beta units that have been recently assembled.
We currently have a limited number of functional beta units in production, and have decided to make a small number of these available to the Kickstarter community. These units look just like the one that you see pictured on our Kickstarter campaign page and come with all the features promised.
We are making this Limited Edition available to Kickstarter backers in order to obtain usage data and insights from a wider audience. These insights will then be incorporated into the Ambi Climate production unit we plan to ship before Summer 2015. As Ambi Climate uses machine learning analytics, our mobile apps and Ambi Cloud backend are set to benefit from the insights gained from early adopters. With your collective feedback we will also be able to tweak Ambi Climate's hardware to better meet your needs.
Our Mission
Founding Team: Timothy Chang, Paul Sykes, Julian Lee
At Ambi Labs, we are designing and creating intelligent upgrades for your home that seamlessly fit your lifestyle.
Our team seeks to reinvent the usability of appliances through add-on upgrades, giving consumers an easy and accessible path to attain the latest in smart functionality.
Over Two Years Of Development
We spent nearly two years gathering insights on user behavior and air conditioner usage performance to fully understand the pain points users have with their ACs. Every single part of Ambi Climate has been thoughtfully designed, from the base of the enclosure to the app's most minute details.
We have been heads down developing our proprietary machine learning system, our own infrared database, the Ambi Climate companion app and the device itself. Having developed and deployed several successful prototypes, we can't wait to share the Ambi Climate experience with you.
               Functional Prototype
Martin from Ambi Labs briefly demonstrates Ambi Climate's most important functionalities.
Technical Specs
Dimensions: 4.10 x 2.05 x 3.46 in (105 x 52 x 88 mm)
Weight: 5.29 oz (150 g) 
Power: 5V DC, 1.0A via micro USB power cable
Sensors: Temperature, humidity, sunlight, motion and location.
Transmission: 5 infrared transmitters (for AC connection) | Wi-Fi: 802.11b, 802.11g and 802.11n-2.4 (for Ambi Cloud & smartphone connection) | Bluetooth 4.0 Low Energy (for iBeacon/micro-location)
LEDs: Three front-faced, green status LEDs (for WiFi connectivity, Ambi Motion Sensor, Ambi Cloud Connection)
What's In The Box?
1x Ambi Climate device 
1x Micro USB Power Cable 
1x USB Power Supply 
Timeline
October 2014 - Launch Kickstarter campaign, refine hardware and mobile app. 
Mid November 2014 - Campaign ends. Organize units and merchandise to begin shipping to Early Bird backers. 
Early December 2014 - Ship Limited Edition beta units, t-shirts and USBs to backers. Collate feedback from beta testers 
January 2014 - Continual upgrades based on feedback from beta testers. Begin ordering long lead time components. 
February 2015 - Finalise Ambi Climate design. Electronic Verification Testing (EVT). 
Late March 2015 - Certification and Design Verification Testing (DVT). Begin component orders. 
April 2015 - Finalize firmware and Ambi Climate mobile applications. Update Limited Edition beta units to latest firmware. 
May 2015 - Kick of Production Verification Testing (PVT). Followed by begin of mass production of Ambi Climate. 
June 2015 - Ship production units to backers. 
Why Kickstarter?
Building a product like ours isn’t easy - we combine not just hardware and software; we are also applying new techniques like machine learning so that air conditioners will become easier to use and more efficient than ever before.
Air conditioners are used in many countries around the world with varying climate conditions. We need your help to test Ambi Climate and to see how much energy we can save in different climates and regions. 
Beyond our beta unit, we require expensive tooling and the volume to buy our components at a discount.
Help us make air conditioners become smarter and more delightful!
Julian Lee - Chief Executive Officer (LinkedIn)
Julian is a seasoned entrepreneur and former VP of Rim Asia Capital Partners, a private equity fund based in Hong Kong. In his over ten years experience of consulting and private equity, he has both strategically advised a number of companies as well as screened and managed portfolio investments.

Tim takes care of Ambi Labs' server side solutions. He is a versatile developer with several years of experience in developing Mobile Device Management (MDM) systems.

Paul is responsible for the hardware and firmware development at Ambi Labs. Previously, Paul had designed hardware for over six years and gone several times through the full development cycle of products within the radio and TV broadcast industry.

We are fortunate to be surrounded by a supportive community of friends and family, many of whom worked tirelessly to bring Ambi Climate to life. We could not have done this without you!

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The Ambi Climate system is comprised of three parts: the hardware, the companion apps and the artificial intelligence ("Ambi Cloud"). Getting these components to work in harmony for every single smartphone and air conditioner in the world is something we are well on our way toward but not yet completely achieved. 

AC Remotes
In order to make the Ambi Climate device simple to set up, we have put in countless hours to build up our own database of remote controllers. While our custom in-house solution is designed to identify your AC remote with the push of just 2-3 buttons, there is a possibility that your specific model may need additional infrared codes. If this issue arises, we will do our best to quickly address it for you.

Production of Hardware
We already have a first batch of over a hundred beta units in local production and do not foresee any challenges with meeting our projected lead times but will keep our backers aware of any changes in our production schedule. The experienced garnered from this will allow for a smooth production of the final production units in 2015.

Android App
Our Android app is still in its very early stages and may not be ready off the bat.

Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning
There is the likelihood that the learning aspect of Ambi Climate may not work perfectly in the beginning for everyone until we have collected sufficient (big) data.

Team
We have full faith in our team, each of whom is known for their ability to deliver. We are fully committed to resolve any issues or challenges as we have many times before. Our earliest supporters will be the first to know about product updates and progress.

campaign.story:
Justin Page is a jazz, R&B/funk drummer & songwriter.   At the age of 13, he was the youngest musician ever to perform at the Newport Jazz Festival.  Four years later, Justin was named a U.S. Presidential Scholar in the Arts, the first drummer or jazz musician on record.
As an adult, Justin turned his professional focus to computer technology, fighting internet crime. But his love for being a musician did not weaken, nor did his exceptional talent or relationships with his peers who went on to become stars in the music world. 
As so many of us do, Justin thought there was plenty of time to work with his colleagues in music and contribute more to his first love. But, unexpectedly, of course, last year, Justin was diagnosed with ALS (amyotrophic lateral sclerosis.) That same illness for which everyone is taking the water bucket challenge. His is progressing comparatively quickly, so while he is still physically able, Justin must record, and other musicians couldn't agree more, or be any more enthusiastic to be in the band.
That’s where Kickstarter comes in. While being a musician is a modestly paying profession, having a debilitating terminal illness is even less lucrative. But that doesn't make the project any less worthwhile.        
Justin Page, jazz pianist Kevin Hays, bassist Doug Weiss, and alto sax player Justin Robinson are heading to the studio for a long overdue, but none too soon, collaboration.  
Not only will this work be Justin’s last hurrah, and an outstanding contribution to jazz, it will be an inspirational album, bringing hope to ALS sufferers and greater awareness of this devastating disease. 
Kevin Hays  One of the premier jazz pianists of his generation. Several of his 15 recordings as leader have received critical acclaim by publications such as The New York Times and Musician Magazine (‘Best of’ list), as well as a Coup de Coeur from the French Académie Charles Cros. Additionally, Hays has appeared on over 60 records as a sideman with Chris Potter, Joshua Redman, Nicholas Payton, Al Foster and others. 2011’s Modern Music (Nonesuch Records), a piano duet recording with fellow pianist Brad Mehldau and composer Patrick Zimmerli, garnered widespread critical acclaim. The duo premiered several works at Carnegie Hall, and toured the project throughout the US, Europe, and South America. Kevin’s solo recording, Variations (Pirouet Records), was released in October 2011 to excellent reviews throughout North America and Europe. The recording features three sets of improvised variations on several original themes, along with exquisite variations on a fugue by Robert Schumann. The New Day Trio is Kevin’s latest project with bassist Rob Jost (Bjork, Tony Scherr) and drummer Greg Joseph (Steve Kuhn, Art Garfunkel). The trio performs new compositions by Hays, and a diverse array of material ranging from 20th century composer Henryk Gorecki to Lerner/Lowe and singer-songwriters Bob Dylan and Rodriguez. The New Day Trio recorded their first album in the summer of 2014 which features special guests Gregoire Maret (harmonica), and Tony Scherr (guitar). In addition to 9 new originals, the recording includes several vocal performances by Hays including an arresting rendition of the Jimmy Webb classic 'Highwayman'. The record will be released in early 2015. For more info, please visit www.kevinhays.com
Justin Robinson Alto saxophonist Justin Robinson was born August 14, 1968, in Manhattan. He first picked up a horn at the age of 13, and honed his sound while attending the High School of Music and Arts (LaGuardia High School) in New York. Robinson developed a passion for the alto sax and, from the influences of Charlie Parker and Jackie McLean, crafted his own distinctive sound. Robinson has collaborated with eminent artists such as the Harper Brothers, Cecil Brooks III, Abbey Lincoln, Diana Ross, Little Jimmy Scott, and the Carnegie Hall Jazz Band, The Dizzy Gillespie All Star Band, and most recently, The Roy Hargrove Big Band in addition to the Roy Hargrove Quintet. Justin Robinson wields a hefty portfolio: joined Harper Brothers at 18, debuted on Verve at 22, a decade's-worth of star sideman gigs. All of that hang-time paid off with his 1998 recording The Challenge on Arabesque Records. Penning six of the compositions, selecting an inspired posse of young ringers (Ron Blake, tenor sax; Stephen Scott, piano; Dwayne Burno, bass; Dion Parsons, drums), Robinson also produced the whole shebang. Robinson also released as a solo artist Justin Time in 1991 with Verve Music Group label. It was produced by Bobby Watson, who also appears on the recording, in additon to Gary Bartz, on alto saxophones, and includes more young ringers of that time: Eddie Henderson - trumpet; Kenny Barron, Stephen Scott - pianos; Peter Washington - bass; Lewis Nash - drums. Justin Robinson lives in New Jersey and is currently touring with trumpeter Roy Hargrove.
Bassist Doug Weiss is a member of several important bands on the international jazz scene. Pianist Kevin Hays trio was formed in 1995 with Weiss at the bass and Bill Stewart at the drums. They have toured the world and made 10 critically acclaimed cds. In 1996 he joined drum legend Al Foster's group. Mr. Foster has played with Sonny, Miles, Herbie, and Joe. His quartet presents his own musical vision of a lifetime in music. They have performed at festivals and clubs in Europe, North and South America, Africa, Asia, and the former Soviet Union. Weiss continues to circulate in the New York club scene, with regular appearances, and is engaged in creating a new work by folk legend Pete Seeger, which is being produced by percussionist Jeff Haynes. Their previous effort, "Tomorrow's Children", won a Grammy for best children's album in 2010 "Mr. Foundation, Mr. Swing" - Al Foster.
Together they are a group of (extremely talented) friends who are passionate with creating solutions for ALS awareness and providing a gift for their colleague and companion that will live on forever. They are dedicated to every detail of this campaign!

We have been very successful in the past with also helping non profit organizations by donating a portion of our proceeds of our sales to these groups. We have made a name for ourselves in the pin making and trading community and are proud to announce our first series of pins and stickers in an ongoing project dedicated to the gaming community. We call it The Gamers Series 1.0 !
Compass
The Gamers Series 1.0 starts as a beautiful antique silver pin. There are seven pins in the series and each pin has a special phrase etched into the back to correlate with the design on the front. These pins will be limited edition and numbered. If this kickstarter is successful then we will hopefully produce another series of a completely different design in the future. Please help us fund this project! We offer some great incentives to those that help us and also have a few surprises in store! The great thing about these pins is that they will be double posted on the back.
Dice I
This adds much more value than a single posted pin because the double posts actually hold the pin in place as opposed to it possibly spinning around or falling off once attached. Double posting is the standard in the pin game and we always offer this with our pieces. The Sloping Companion has had great success in producing antique silver style pins.
Dice II
The series depicts seven iconic images from the gaming community along with two words that often get used wrong. We have three well known die in the series.  There is a compass, sword, shield, geek and nerd pin. Each pin also has an etched phrase in the back depicting a correlation to the icon on the front.  Production is all ready to go. All we need now is the funding. The decals will also reflect these same images and will be four inch in diameter and will be weather resistant. These are all ready for production. campaign.story:
The Periodyx Game is more than just a game!
Yes, the Periodyx Game is fun, and the ten bonus games are even more fun, but the superstars of all these games are the 118 Element Cards. The more you play with the Periodyx Game cards; the more you'll know about the Elements, the more you know, the more you'll appreciate and enjoy them. 
Some Elements are toxic, radioactive, and scary, like Plutonium, and others are fun and friendly like Oxygen, but they're all real powers in the universe – dynamic and lively!
After you see the Element Card Arsenic, you will never forget it, and when you discover that the Element, Carbon can become a diamond – you won't forget that either!
The Game Cards
Each Element has its own brilliantly and descriptively illustrated card that includes fun trivia facts, and accurate stats. Plus, the all-important phonetic guide to the pronunciation of the Element's name.
No more guessing, or should we say – GES-ing! All the information is creatively used to play the Periodyx Game, and all ten of the bonus games listed below.
These colorful, entertaining Periodyx Game cards have been fully checked, and approved by teachers, science professionals, and home schoolers to ensure all the facts, and stats are currently correct. 
The world needs more scientists, so kids need to become familiar, and comfortable with basic science early. Super heroes and fantasy-play is great, but discovering the real superpowers of the universe, like the fantastic Elements, Krypton and Nitrogen is even greater! 
Periodyx, An Elemental Game 
Number of players: 2 to 10
Ages: Reading age and up
Contents: 124 cards: 118 Character Element Cards, one Game Indicator Card, and 5 Instruction Cards
The Periodyx game has a unique game play – the game changes as each round changes. A different, fast, and easy game is played with each round.
The Game Indicator Card is passed around the players in a clockwise direction, as each player takes a turn being the lead player for a round.
Game Play:
Shuffle the cards, and deal each player 5 cards.
The first player to win ten cards ends, and wins the game, no matter how many rounds have been played. The game ends when one player loses all of their cards, no matter how many rounds have been played.
During the game, cards are won by player-on-player challenges, predictions against a blind draw from the deck, or in building a periodic color-coded chart of cards.
For example, a player might find themselves challenging another player's 'Atomic Power', predicting the future in the 'Early Bird' round, or turning up the temperature during the 'Hot Stuff' game, and then there's always the 'Element of Surprise'!
The Games Rounds: Atomic Power, Big Freeze, Hot Stuff, Hi-Lo, A2Z, Neutron Countdown, Add-it, Element of Surprise, Early Bird, Match, and Natural/Synthetic/Atomic.
No matter which one of the ten fast-paced rounds is played, the more a player gets to know the Elements the better their odds of winning, and the more they play – the more they know.
To get even more out of these amazing Periodyx Game cards, we have created ten more games for educators, home schoolers, and hardcore Element-fans of all ages.
Periodyx Bonus Games
The ten Periodyx Bonus Games are presented in a 16-page booklet of detailed, full-color, and fully illustrated instructions.
The ten bonus games are:
Periods: A rummy-style game in which players compete to collect and make seven periods in the fastest time.
Element War: A war-style game using the statistics, and information found on each Element card, in attempt to win all the cards. 
Tantalum Trios: As cards are placed into rows and columns, look for trios to win.
Dysprosium Draw: Draw clues to an element's identity and get other players to correctly identify the Element.
Silly Silicon Search: Find the hidden Element by a process of elimination. 
Curious Curium: Guess the Element from a series of one-word clues.
Nuclear Pile: From a spread-out pile of cards, find two cards that have one or more things in common, first match wins.
Mendelevium Match: Be the first player to slap your hand on the card from the deck that matches in any way one of the cards in your hand, to collect the cards. The first player to make three matches wins.
Plutonic Pelmenism: A classic memory game played with all the Element cards, or with specific types of Element cards, like the gasses or the heavy metal Elements.
Mendeleev's Table: A domino-style game to connect the cards, and build the classic arrangement of the complete Periodic table.
Custom Card Deck!
Pledge at the $75 level, and we will customize the Periodyx cards for you. We will supply a complete Periodyx Game, manufactured to the same quality as the regular cards, customized with your name, school, corporation, company, club, or institution's logo or name on the back of every Periodyx card. 
Please note that the cards themselves will be customized but will come in the regular Periodyx packaging.
We are ready to go to press!
We have already invested in the illustrations, the editorial content, the package design and vendor sourcing. All that is left to do is to ask for your help to get the Periodyx Game into production, and into the hands of game players so...
Please help us make the Periodyx Game a reality, like all of the game's 118 amazing Elements!

campaign.story:
Introduction:
The Best of Shit People Say: Volume 1 is a work of "edutainment” – part education, part entertainment – driven by the common language of ordinary people, whose voices are not often heard in the world of popular literature.
The Book is an Encyclopedia by legal definition because (a) It is a self contained reference in which unfamiliar language is explained at times, and (b) Unusual terms are periodically defined.
99.9% of the sayings in the Book will be considered "common short phrases", "titles", or "facts" under U.S. Copyright Law and therefore are not eligible for copyright protection. For example, "She's sweatin' like a hooker in Church" and "He's dumb as dirt, bless his heart" under "Shit Southern Women Say" are phrases commonly used throughout the southern United States, and are therefore not the original work of the authors who will be credited in the Book.
However, in the those rare cases that a phrase is a "unique expression", permission is being sought for the use of that phrase from the original author.
That permission is not always granted, as a result those of you familiar with the Shit People Say phenomenon may be disappointed to know that a number of the original classics such as “Shit Girls Say” are being left out of the Book, even though a number of popular favorites such as “Shit Girls with Big Boobs Say” and “Shit Gamers Say to their Girlfriends” will be included.
  The Project Mission:
It must be understood that what is funny on video is often not funny in book format as the written word, so the Book will not simply be based on hit videos of guys in wigs and lip stick, or hot girls in soccer uniforms.
Instead it is being put together to reflect the full depth and range of the many Shit People Say topics in logical book format. Our reward program ensures that everyone who makes a pledge, even at the minimum level, gets to enjoy the entire product. That is quite rare for a crowdfunding campaign.
Furthermore, every contributor at the $25 level and higher will be granted the status of Encyclopedia Co-founding Member.
The full perks and benefits of holding Founding Member status are being worked out, we really want to make it worthwhile, not just for bragging rights at dinner parties.
Let us please not allow too much political correctness to keep humanity divided by stifling healthy self expression. This project and others like it can play a crucial role in society for people who are considered different to no longer just be tolerated. Instead they may now be understood and appreciated, and maybe even accepted. Kickstarter has earned our heartfelt gratitude for hosting this project.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Challenge 1. The pledges you make as Backers will mostly go towards paying for the TIME of a few copyeditors, writers and proofreaders, who are carefully screened for their literary skills. If one or more of them decide to back out of the Project, encounter an emergency or fail to keep up with their workload for any reason, it will cause a delay in completing the Book. 

However, the people who began this Project began it on a volunteer basis because we enjoy the social interaction, not for money. Even if a collaborator backs out, their assignment will be picked-up by someone else and the Project will continue. Therefore there is little or no risk of us failing to deliver the Book. 

The main purpose of this crowdfunding campaign is really to speed up the production of a Book that's already been in the works, at the same time, to develop it in the best way we can by taking into account Backer input from their comments and emails etc., on what they possibly hope to see in the Book and / or what they might not like. We will be working very fast and are open to suggestions. 

Also, by actually paying our collaborators from Backer funds, we will be demonstrating that the Project is serious and should be handled professionally, which in turn will result in a higher quality Book.

Challenge 2. The rewards have already been selected and budgeted for, but will only be ordered AFTER the Project is complete. Because we are budgeting down to the penny, if over the next 3 months a reward item becomes unavailable from the supplier by being sold out or discontinued, etc., or if the wholesale price of an item goes up, we will then be forced to look for an alternative supplier to fulfill the reward program, which may result in us failing to carry it out exactly as described.

Wholesale gift suppliers often run out of stock on various items, especially discounted products. With that said, we did do our very best to choose products that have the highest chance of being available when the campaign ends and will keep our Backers posted every step of the way on all aspects of the Project.

Challenge 3. Some of you may be asking why translate the Book?
Why not just publish it in English? There are a number of important reasons for this, but to be brief. The crowdsourcing campaign itself is only being done in English and on this website. The translations will begin after the campaign ends, using a portion of the Backer funds while the pre-release English version of the Book is being sent out with the other reward items. 

The fact that we will still have to order, customize and ship out actual material rewards to our Backers after the very labor intensive process of producing the Book, without a major publisher supporting us, may actually not be worth all the trouble if the whole thing turns out to be one big flop, since the success of any book is never guaranteed. 

Lack of response if there is just one author involved is one thing, but for a group like ours with families, some chronically under employed, with all their future hopes and dreams pinned on the Project, a real back-up plan is necessary. 

By translating the Book into other major languages when it gets funded, we are providing ourselves with a security cushion for when it comes time to publish the Book, at which point we want to be well positioned with an immediate foothold in the global market place.

That means using a portion of the crowd sourced funds to print out a few hundred hard copies of the Book in other key languages, quickly sending them out to offshore bloggers, critics, market makers and prospective retail partners and then actively establishing reliable shipping supply chains early in the process to get all the mistakes and gliches out of the way before the proper international Book release. In doing so, will best be able to meet high demand if the Project turns out to be a major hit both domestically and globally.
